## getUrlOrigin() function

Get `origin` part of URL.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getUrlOrigin(url: string | undefined): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  url | string \| undefined | input URL  origin of given URL |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

## Example

https://example.com/foo -<!-- -->&gt; https://example.com //example.com:8080/ -<!-- -->&gt; //example.com:8080 file:///etc/hosts -<!-- -->&gt;
